transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello? Ji, namaskar sir.
Executive: Namaskar boliye. Ji ji Priyanshu bol raha tha sir aapka account manager IndiaMART se. Kaise hain aap?
Customer: Bolye bolye. Kal shayad aapka customer care pe call aaya tha. To kal wo chutti thi na Kartik Purnima ki to wahi maine aaj dekha ki mail aaya hua tha.
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Aapko parso call kiya tha na?
Executive: Nahi nahi ye aapka aaya hai. Uh, kal aaya sir. Ha, kal aaya hai ye aapka kitne baje aaya hai? 6 tarikh ko 12:42 pe, 12:42 pe.
Customer: Kitna tarikh ko?
Executive: Kal 6 tarikh ko sir. Eh sorry, ye to aaj open hua hai. Ha nahi nahi ye aapka 5 tarikh ko 12:42 pe shayad call aaya hoga.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: To aaj mere paas wo mail aaya hai ki sir ne call kiya tha. To mere direct number pe aata to main matlab utha leta. Ab ye company wale number pe aapne kiya hua tha to mujhe pata hi nahi chala.
Customer: Nahi aap to mere ko call hi nahi karta hai. Aap to us mahina mein ek baar nahi to do mahina mein ek baar call karta hai service kaisa hai.
Executive: Nahi maine kiya tha beech mein nahi thoda sa hame discussion karna tha to aapne bola tha ki main free hounga to karunga. Maine do teen baar kiya to us do teen baar aapke paas time nahi tha us time pe. Aapne bola thoda sa sahi hua hai pehle se. To abhi hum isko karenge baat. To mujhe laga ki aapke paas number to hai hi mera. Humne save up kara rakha hai. WhatsApp bhi kiya hua tha. Maine kaha sir karenge mujhe free hoke. To is chakkar mein fir maine jyada kiya nahi sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Koi nahi ab main aapko har 15 din mein ek baar sir kar liya karunga. Ya jaise aap bole hafte mein bole to main har hafte. Har hafte isliye nahi karta hu na aap bhi busy rehte hain fir aap bolenge baar baar call aata hai.
Customer: Abhi hum renewal kab hai hamara?
Executive: Renewal to aapka time hai. Renewal hai aapka bata raha hu.

Ye 7 February, 7 February ko hai sir.
Customer: 26 February?
Executive: Ji ji ji. 7 Feb, 7 February.
Customer: Aapko nahi lag raha hai hum dobara usme plan lena hai agar ki?
Executive: Nahi main to sir chahta hi hu matlab main isliye laga bhi rehta hu aapse baat karta hu to kuch na kuch main usme apne hisab se kai baar aapse baat nahi bhi hoti hai na to bhi apne hisab se kuch na kuch karta rehta hu.
Customer: Nahi jab beech mein khali baat karke kya fayda hai? Kaam hona chahiye na.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Ha, wo ho raha hai.
Executive: Ji aap to utna nahi utna hi ho paya pehle to bahut hi jyada pareshani thi apne ko sir isme.
Customer: Fir bhi aap abhi ek hafte nahi to do hafte se pehle ka pareshani mein hi hai. Wahi hai.
Executive: Same hi hai.
Customer: Dekho humko isme se paisa milega to hum isme paisa dalenge.
Executive: Ha aapne bola hua tha mujhe.
Customer: Ha. Sir main isme nahi ho raha hai to nahi kuch nahi kar payega. Aap dekh lo.
Executive: Nahi sir main isme yahi chah raha tha ki ek baar thoda sa waise kar online aake hum discuss kar lete. Aise ek baar nahi hum logo ne kiya tha online aake. To usme thoda sa meri bhi madad ho jati to main sab cheeze kar pata hu. Jaise phone pe kya hai aapke paas sari cheeze idhar se nahi hoti. Kuch cheeze mujhe aapke side se karani hoti hain. To waise to har mahine review hota hai company ka but hum log ka har mahine nahi ho pata hai. To ek baar thoda sa main keh raha hu 10-15 minute ka time aaj hota aapke paas agar to aaj aap mujhe de dete online aake system pe.
Customer: Lekin system pe baithne ke liye time nahi hoga mere paas.
Executive: Achcha system. Thik hai. Ha.
Customer: Kyunki mera ek office ka staff bhi chutti hai do teen mahina ke liye chutti liya hua hai.
Executive: Staff?
Customer: Ha mera account jo account sambhalta hai. Ha. Wo Pradhan tha. Uske karan wo chutti pe hai. Main hi sambhalta hu pura office sab site jo party wagera sab kuch main akela sambhalna pad raha hai. To mere ko utna time nahi mil pa raha hai thik hai.
Executive: Ha wo to samajh raha hu main. Ha. Ye jo bhi hai aapko to pata hai na kaise karna hai kya hai. Ji achcha ek kaam sir hum kar sakte hain main main ek kaam karta hu aaj hi isme kuch na kuch main kaam start karta hu. To main aapko WhatsApp pe jo bhi agar mujhe kuch aapke side se kuch chahiye hoga to main aapse WhatsApp pe mang lunga aap waha. Ji ye sahi rahega sir. Main aisa karta hu. Ha sir isko aise kar lete hain. Main abhi start kar deta hu isme karna. Dekhta hu kya kya cheeze hain jitna mere main fatafat pehle apna wala karta hu jaha mujhe aapki help ki hogi to main aapko seedha WhatsApp hi kar dunga. To aapko main call pe bhi nahi rehna padega aur aise kaam ho jayega. Thik hai sir?
Customer: Thik hai. Aur aapse har 10 din ya 15 din mein main aapse follow up ke liye connect bhi karunga sir.
Executive: Thik hai jo bhi hai wo clear karke aa jayega thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai sir thik hai. Thank you sir.
Customer: Okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer states he is facing issues.

- Customer says he is not getting enough leads.

- Customer says he is busy and short on time.



Resolution:

- Executive apologized for the delayed call.

- Executive offered to help via WhatsApp.

- Executive offered to follow up every 10-15 days.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will start working and contact via WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- renewal, follow up, whatsapp, buyleads
